yeah this isnt a happy ending, she was psychologically fucked with and basically has Stockholm syndrome. She was forced at first to pay off a debt, but because serotonin is addictive, like a drug, she came to expect her violation daily. when it suddenly stopped, she lost that sero boost and she had no healthy alternative. she "fell in love" with him because he was the source of that boost. should change the ntr tag to mindfuck or blackmail or something like that. while i kinda feel bad for aki, im pretty sure thats his biological sister. he should find a viable partner and disown his slut sister.
